  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="87945" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="87945" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.71</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="410">410</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="105"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Eilish No.3</b> by <b>Billie Eilish</b> is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. <b>Eilish No.3</b> was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Linda Chinery. Top notes are Pink Pepper, Grapefruit and Jasmine; middle notes are Fir, Saffron and Cedar; base notes are Musk, Amber and Oakmoss. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>"Eilish No. 3 is a tantalizing fragrance that opens with a blend of grapefruit, pink peppercorn, and jasmine. It unfolds into spicy hints of saffron, fresh fir needle, and creamy cedar. At the base, velvety notes of amber and earthy oakmoss intertwine in perfect harmony. As a whisper of skin musk emerges, it leaves an unforgettable impression."</p>

<p>Available in 100ml Eau de Parfum.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a </fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="87945"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.91.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Pink-Pepper-91.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Pink Pepper</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.90728327058369; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.76.jpg" style="width: 3.35rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Grapefruit-76.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Grapefruit</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.14.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Jasmine-14.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Jasmine</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.205.jpg" style="width: 4.825rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Fir-205.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Fir</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.92323619588367; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.55.jpg" style="width: 3.45rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Saffron-55.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Saffron</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.92323619588367; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.41.jpg" style="width: 3.45rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Cedar-41.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Cedar</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.98726063291633; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.4.jpg" style="width: 3.9rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Musk-4.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Musk</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.97738001487017; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.54.jpg" style="width: 3.825rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Amber-54.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Amber</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.86862915010152; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.39.jpg" style="width: 3.125rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Oakmoss-39.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Oakmoss</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level></pyramid-switch></div></div><div class="cell text-center"><button class="button small" data-open="NotesRatingModal">Vote for Ingredients</button></div></div><notes-rating :perfume_id="87945"></notes-rating></div><div class="cell small-12"><vue-encrypt-postscribe slotid='2e7b94ae1d05eb0dbaa49e21eddac3bd228' slotpayload='{"ct":"cnrO\/Jn\/Oignm0LiVVijSwSTgBC4bid9SEJdOzDrOa5k4zacEaHzfWGrtKGJwru48H4Mg3KD21ZsjqpbwF4x34ORmkSB\/l2LHeHwluXjSXWppzPz1eMNr+2zX90CCtUUHQj+Ct+LfpHQDkZgFpwt4torn3vPQkS\/dQSRDodmdQoLgZhSv9BKWmhXpNl+gvbtAvxj7wFQISs8mTlmQxxBJuRcyjejRArIzxNKs9gCE8AJU5AI3OCkn+lJZ9KLjz8HjI0CMFQnIFdUxcgUnCL1Nr\/8Jvv93wPJgqZNw97MMKT4isLB7eeNYPt1Qq\/YD\/uQ","iv":"09713611ece586292ca45dad6034f8c0","s":"14b9ad8de04d75ba"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-padding-y"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3 -->

Ariana Grande" width="125" height="140"><span class="brand">Ariana Grande</span><br><span class="ztworowseclipse">R.E.M.</span></a></div><div class="carousel-cell"><a href="/perfume/Mugler/Alien-707.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.707.jpg"alt="Alien Mugler" width="125" height="140"><span class="brand">Mugler</span><br><span class="ztworowseclipse">Alien</span></a></div><div class="carousel-cell"><a href="/perfume/Kayali-Fragrances/Lovefest-Burning-Cherry-48-Eau-de-Parfum-75661.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.75661.jpg"alt="Lovefest Burning Cherry | 48 Eau de Parfum Kayali Fragrances" width="125" height="140"><span class="brand">Kayali Fragrances</span><br><span class="ztworowseclipse">Lovefest Burning Cherry | 48 Eau de Parfum</span></a></div><div class="carousel-cell"><a href="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Ari-31661.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.31661.jpg"alt="Ari Ariana Grande" width="125" height="140"><span class="brand">Ariana Grande</span><br><span class="ztworowseclipse">Ari</span></a></div></div><carousel-perfumes></carousel-perfumes><span title="/perfume-finder/?p=87945" class="idLinkify"><span class="button small" style="color: white">Find more recommendations</span></span></div><div class="cell small-12" style="padding: 2px;"><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x" id="newreview" style="margin-top:30px"><div class="rw-frame"><p class="linkrg"><span title="/board/register.php" class="rtg">Become a member of this online perfume community and you will be able to add your own reviews.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="cell small-12"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>

height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem;     <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2368699" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2368699" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="raidiological"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1242256"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1242256.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="raidiological" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2368699ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2368699" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); Mix of pepper, grapefruit and saffron are surprisingly well  The pepper smell isn't too strong like other perfumes with pepper. Faint woody smell makes it suitable for men too. Love it </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2361177"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2361177#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2356140" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2356140" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="emmamanson"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1833623"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="emmamanson" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.87945.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eilish No.3"title="Eilish No.3"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2356140ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2356140" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1833623">emmamanson</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-21">11/21/24 01:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I saw that this was in stock at superdrug and made a super spontaneous decision to buy it, never having tried it out before. I didn't even particularly like the look of the notes, as for me I'm usually more of a sweet scent kind of person. However, I read reviews saying it reminded people of Christmas and I am obsessed with Christmas so I thought...why not? Almost every perfume purchase I make are blind buys because there is nowhere in my area where I can test them out. <br />
<br />
I am very pleasantly surprised! Yes, it doesn't last the longest but I adore this scent so much more than I thought I would. The bottle is beautiful imo (I love red), it smells very peppery and woody to me. I thought this was very unisex but my boyfriend tried it and said absolutely not - that it is very feminine. He loves it as well though, said it is more of a sexy scent. I see what people mean about the Christmas thing. I do recommend trying it first before buying if you can because it is really unique.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2356140"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2356140#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2345859" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2345859" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Faeriecoma"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723067"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1723067.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Faeriecoma" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Ari-31661.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31661.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ari"title="Ari"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2345859ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2345859" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723067">Faeriecoma</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-11">11/11/24 19:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Personally this is a smoky grapefruit scent to me. I love it because it reminds me of growing up with a wood fire stove for heating. Unfortunately the sillage and longevity is nonexistent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2345859"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2345859#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2318724" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2318724" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="miss_aly"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1382225"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1382225.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="miss_aly" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70052.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eilish"title="Eilish"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2318724ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2318724" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1382225">miss_aly</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-17">10/17/24 09:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love this one! I'm so glad that it's unique and doesn't just smell like every other pop girlie's frag out there! Very unisex, perf for the fall and winter!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2318724"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2318724#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2318101" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2318101" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SuperSueChick"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/43791"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.43791.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SuperSueChick" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2318101ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2318101" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/43791">SuperSueChick</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-16">10/16/24 17:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This brand has been knocking it out of the park. <br />
I'm surprised for a celebrity fragrance, how well made these are.<br />
<br />
I got the No.1 not for the fragrance, but for the bottle to match my office decor not even really considering the juice. Then I was pleasantly surprised.<br />
Bottle No.2 I got out of curiosity to see how it compared to No.1 Same game diff scent. Well made for a Santal that i never expected. <br />
<br />
Now... Bottle No. 3<br />
The bottle is artsy like the other flankers, it's heavy, and this one is a lovely bronzed pink. <br />
<br />
First impression:<br />
Dark, cold, juicy but smokey and gave vampire-y vibes.<br />
Took me to Loretto Chapel, a stucco cathedral in Santa Fe, NM with the miracle staircase.<br />
You're on an October tour around Santa Fe, New mexico.  Your tour takes you to the shops, art kiosks, Restaurants, and to that church where they tell you about the story of the miracle staircase.<br />
You walk in, the wood floors are creaky, feels a bit musky and dusty. You smell the inscents mixed with the Santa Fe cool Fall air, and the holy water at the entrance.    <br />
In the group you look around at the other tourists, and then you spot an elegant man that you hadn't seen in your group before.  Ohh he is wickedly handsome.  You start to feel some sort of way, but can't help looking back at him. Your eyes meet and he gives you a hella sexy grin.  You blush, look down, and look up at him but he is gone. <br />
What?! Where is he?  In some odd way you "feel" his presence, but you can't see him.  <br />
You dismiss it and go through the tour.  <br />
It starts getting a bit colder, the church inscents start to die down, the sun is going down. <br />
You see a beautiful exotic woman that also wasn't in your tour before. She's gorgeous and again you can't help but look at her.  She starts lighting candles and a faint vanilla scent wraps around you.<br />
As she lights them, the handsome man from before returns and starts blowing them out. <br />
You're offered a glass of red wine. <br />
After a few sips you look up and you're not with your tour anymore. <br />
You were so distracted by the beauty before your eyes, the combination of dark cool scents, and the taste of your seductive red wine made you miss your tour. Its now the bewitching hour. You're in for a wicked time. Drink up my friends, stay if you dare (not for everyone), enjoy!  </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2318101"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2318101#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2289803" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2289803" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Heather Pine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2252304"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2252304.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Heather Pine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2289803ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2289803" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2252304">Heather Pine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-20">09/20/24 16:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>OMG, this fragrance gives major Rebecca Minkoff vibesso close to the vegan fragrance its almost like theyre twins!  But it also smells like CHRISTMAS in a bottle ! Picture pine trees, wood crackling in the fire, Christmas room sprays, and cozy vanilla candles all mixed together. Its like the scent of everything that is Christmas wrapped up in a single spritz. <br />
<br />
I can only wear this fragrance during December, thoughits the perfect scent for snuggling up in the holiday feels. </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2289803"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2289803#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2263053" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2209692">freyja0619</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-01">08/01/24 05:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>when you first spray it, it smells very musky and spicy but as it sets it brings out a beautiful aquatic and fresh smell, most unique out of the three <br />
the bottle is gorgeous and i love the colour <br />
i can still smell the perfume on me after 24hrs which is brilliant <br />
will repurchase</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2235535"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2235535#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2227482" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2227482" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Wwoman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1259477"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1259477.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Wwoman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kajal/Sawlaj-41077.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41077.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sawlaj"title="Sawlaj"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2227482ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2227482" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1259477">Wwoman</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-23">07/23/24 18:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is high-end Christmas candle when first sprayed. Soon the amber and other notes catch up with the pine, thank goodness. As it dries down, you get a lot more of the spiciness from pepper and saffron. After dry down, the Amber and pine play a supporting role as bass notes, which saves this from being embarrassingly photorealistic holiday air freshener. Instead, a fresh and almost acidic aspect from the combination of grapefruit and oak moss tempers the initial spiciness, which saves it from being a photorealistic, pumpkin spice/apple pie air freshener. This is helped by the fact that it is not super sweet, which is ideal for me because of gourmands are generally not my jam. With impressive lasting power, the final sent on me is very much a spicy, woody amber. I think it's interesting that so many people rated musk as the most dominant note, while on me musk plays only a supporting role in rounding out the base notes and increasing longevity. Overall, this is a beautiful fragrance that I will thoroughly enjoy in late autumn and early winter.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2227482"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2227482#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2214177" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It initially smells very juicy because of the grapefruit, and immediately settles down into a watery, creamy pine scent. theres some cedar thrown in there and I only picked up on the pink pepper about 10 minutes after I sprayed my skin. Its sweet, musky, and unisex. Perfect for the holidays </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2186511"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2186511#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2180290" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2180290" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ciaramyrea"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1570634"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1570634.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ciaramyrea" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/FORVR-MOOD/I-AM-HER-92881.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.92881.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="I AM HER"title="I AM HER"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2180290ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2180290" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1570634">ciaramyrea</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-06">06/06/24 13:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this is a sweet and comforting fragrance. its perfectly unisex imo, i think it would be perfect on anybody, any gender and everyone in between can pull this off. i would def love to see how this wears on my husband. ive had this for 8 months and the longevity has really improved, and all the notes seem to just come off stronger in general. i love how different all the flankers are, there is something for everyone :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2180290"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2180290#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2176126" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's definitely not for everyone.. Niche quality here.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2176126"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2176126#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2172267" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2172267" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hysteria1988"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2081331"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2081331.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hysteria1988" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/L-Interdit-Eau-de-Parfum-Rouge-Ultime-83865.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83865.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Interdit Eau de Parfum Rouge Ultime"title="L'Interdit Eau de Parfum Rouge Ultime"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2172267ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2172267" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2081331">hysteria1988</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-30">05/30/24 06:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I first got this in January, it smelled like a pine car air freshener, i understood the 'Christmas' vibe people were picking up on, but there wasn't one ounce of sweetness at all and i was honestly disappointed. <br />
Fast forward 5 months and it's been sitting among its cohorts 1&amp;2, I gave it a spray there now and it has matured a bit, and is less pine and more pepper, still not getting any musk or grapefruit though, Its not my favorite and to be honest ive sprayed it a bunch of times and i'm struggling to smell it. <br />
<br />
Ill keep it in my collection, I would not recommend buying this blindly!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2172267"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2172267#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2166771" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2166771" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Antique-Freak"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1791147"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Antique-Freak" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jimmy-Choo/Urban-Hero-56740.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56740.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Urban Hero"title="Urban Hero"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2166771ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2166771" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1791147">Antique-Freak</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-24">05/24/24 13:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>More musky than I expected or would like. Hopefully it grows on me. I didnt believe that the sillage or staying power would be as weak as people say because the same is often said of No1 and No2, which are two of the strongest in my collection. Alas, it is true, you'd get a stronger and longer lasting scent out of a LaCroix can. I cant recommend this to anyone purely because of the poor performance.<br />
<br />
Not very sweet, not as "Christmassy" as people say. The fir and cedar are there in the beginning, but towards the end all I smell is how overwhelming the musk is. NOT BLIND BUY SAFE, get a decant before buying the full bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2166771"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2166771#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2151793" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2137024" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Morgen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1261405"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1261405.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Morgen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/H-M/Modern-Minimalist-92539.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.92539.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Modern Minimalist"title="Modern Minimalist"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2137024ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2137024" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1261405">Morgen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-26">04/26/24 08:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a very pleasant scent. The beginning is strong peppery, but once you get past that, it becomes a piney and powdery scent, similar to Ormonde Woman. Its durability and sillage are relatively weak.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2137024"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2137024#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2124802" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2124802" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Faellen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/862923"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.862923.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Faellen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Britney-Spears/Candied-Fantasy-93613.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93613.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Candied Fantasy"title="Candied Fantasy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2124802ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2124802" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/862923">Faellen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-14">04/14/24 15:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow, this smells really, really good.<br />
<br />
I don't how how many here are familiar with Ffern, a organic perfume maker in the UK who have a ledger you subscribe to, but Eilish 3 smells like something Ffern would put out. <br />
<br />
I get the peppery grapefruit immediately, then lots of woods and fir (though not as piney as Eilish 2). And a hint of Juicy Fruit gum! The grapefruit remains throughout. Definitely a winter, kinda Christmassy scent. Not your typical generic celebrity fragrance at all. I would call this unisex, absolutely. <br />
My one complaint is the longevity, this does not stick around as long as its sisters. <br />
<br />
Contrary to some reviews and the "reminds me of" suggestions, I do not smell BR540 in any way, shape or form.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2124802"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2124802#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2114088" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2114088" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DarkSparkle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1581147"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1581147.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DarkSparkle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.87945.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eilish No.3"title="Eilish No.3"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2114088ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2114088" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1581147">DarkSparkle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-04">04/04/24 08:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At first it smells just like Christmas. But actually there's something fresh, creamy and watery just underneath that creates a mysterious scent. Unfortunately the sillage is very weak and the fragrance is gone within an hour or two.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2114088"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2114088#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2101471" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2101471" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WinterSneeuw"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1183748"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1183748.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="WinterSneeuw" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Black-Opium-Intense-52924.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52924.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Opium Intense"title="Black Opium Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2101471ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2101471" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1183748">WinterSneeuw</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-23">03/23/24 05:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I sniffed all of the Eilish perfumes for the first time 2 weeks ago. Eilish 3 stood out the most, to me it smelled exactly like a pine showergel I used when I would go swimming as a kid. Between the ages of 4 and 10 I would go swimming with my parents and little sisters about 3 times a week at least. Smelling Eilish3 made me feel very nostalgic and happy.<br />
<br />
I own BR540 and people on fragrantica commented a lot that Eilish3 is a BR540 clone, but its not. Eilish 3 has not that overbearing sweet and borderline cleaning product/hospital like smell. Eilish 3 is just pines all the way for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2101471"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2101471#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2098086" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2098086" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lmnsvgz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1259533"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1259533.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lmnsvgz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Armani-Prive-Vert-Malachite-34588.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.34588.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Armani Prive Vert Malachite"title="Armani Prive Vert Malachite"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2098086ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2098086" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1259533">lmnsvgz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-20">03/20/24 02:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells very dark and spicy. It is quite sharp. I still respect her for releasing more different scents compared to the classic light floral sweet celebrity scents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2098086"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2098086#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2094302" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2094302"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2094302#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2094094" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2094094" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BigHeartNosehole"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2040623"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2040623.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BigHeartNosehole" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Filippo-Sorcinelli/Quickie-and-Coffee-90649.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90649.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Quickie and Coffee"title="Quickie and Coffee"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2094094ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2094094" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2040623">BigHeartNosehole</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-16">03/16/24 02:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So since its finally in my country I needed to smell it. I really love be no.1 and 2. It actually smells quite niche. But be no3 really disappointed me. I sprayed it on my wrist and the opening smelled so familiar to an other fragrance but I cant think of which one. Anyway. I didnt smell it after 30 minutes and my boyfriend didnt smell it to. I wouldve loved how it wouldve performed during the day but I guess Ill never know.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2094094"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2094094#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2093615" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2093615" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mariaivanova0518"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1664244"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1664244.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mariaivanova0518" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Victoria-s-Secret/Victoria-s-Secret-Angel-Gold-16930.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16930.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Victorias Secret Angel Gold"title="Victorias Secret Angel Gold"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2093615ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2093615" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1664244">mariaivanova0518</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-15">03/15/24 13:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was super excited when I saw that it arrived in Europe and ordered it immediately.  <br />
<br />
At first, the smell is really strong and if you spray too much of it you might get nauseous. It opens with a spicy, woody scent, to me it has a hint of pine wood and pepper, and it actually reminds me of an old, vintage perfume my father would wear in the winter. Somehow it reminds me of the Christmas holidays back when I was a kid and the scent brings out a sense of nostalgia. <br />
<br />
However, I can barely smell it after a few minutes. It is really discreet and you barely get a really vague hint of it during the day. Haven't tried it on clothes yet but my guess is you won't feel it that much on them as well. When it dries down the scent gets more on the sweetish side. I can definitely see why people say it's similar to BR540. To me, when it dries down, it smells exactly like a combination of Zara's Red temptation and Go Fruity (which is a dupe for Burberry Her but honestly it reminds me more of Ariana's Cloud), where the second one is dominating.<br />
<br />
Overall I would say it smells a bit sweet with a hint of spice. I am a little disappointed, also did not read the information about the bottle size and I am stuck with the 100ml. <br />
<br />
Edit: A month later, I still couldn't love it and gave it to my boyfriend. I tried so hard to like it but honestly, it actually smells like a dusty Christmas sweater. Her first one was the best and is still one of my favorite perfumes, but I'm kinda glad that this was her last one because somehow they just kept getting worse.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2093615"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2093615#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2091715" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
