Now it's available in Europe. In Douglas. For price lower than the official one. And without 70 euro import fees and delivery.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2091715"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2091715#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2091363" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2091363" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aleah"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1556222"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1556222.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="aleah" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lolita-Lempicka/Fleur-Defendue-3004.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3004.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fleur Defendue"title="Fleur Defendue"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2091363ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2091363" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1556222">aleah</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-13">03/13/24 10:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At first sprays it is a big like; let's see how it gets in a few months.<br />
I've read in here claims it smells like BR540 based on the notes.... Well, it does not :)) maybe like a cousin twice removed at best.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2091363"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2091363#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2090906" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2090906" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Candyshop12"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1980707"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1980707.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Candyshop12" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2090906ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2090906" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1980707">Candyshop12</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-12">03/12/24 22:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I actually enjoy this fragrance on a cold night. It gives a nostalgic feeling of holiday times as a kid with a airy clean pine note and sweetness  waving in the air. I feel it is unisex and really nice. It can develop different on each person's chemistry. I love the drydown which to me i see the b-540 base sweet note but the pine flex does make it not the same as 540 to me. This is Byredo's gypsy water with pine added and the sweet base of 540.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2090906"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2090906#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2087436" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2087436" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BlossomBrain"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1994033"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1994033.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BlossomBrain" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2087436ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2087436" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1994033">BlossomBrain</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-09">03/09/24 15:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the worst thing I have ever smelled after a very long time. No 1 was the most impressive one. No 2 is very generic and no 3 got out to be the smell of a car that was sitting under the sun for 24 hours with no break and no windows open. I honestly got nauseous.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2087436"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2087436#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2086106" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2086106" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hellebelle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1239084"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1239084.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hellebelle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lush/What-Would-Love-Do-50163.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50163.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="What Would Love Do"title="What Would Love Do"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2086106ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2086106" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1239084">hellebelle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-08">03/08/24 07:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love when I can glance at the notes and immediately tell its yet another dupe of Baccarat Rouge. This time with _____ (insert fruit). <br />
And it comes in a red bottle, because of course it does. <br />
<br />
When will this trend stop? Its going on 10 years now </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2086106"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2086106#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2059440" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I really tried to like it    .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2059440"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2059440#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2058500" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2058500" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Blossomlove"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1951646"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1951646.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Blossomlove" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Stephane-Humbert-Lucas-777/God-of-Fire-72381.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72381.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="God of Fire"title="God of Fire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2058500ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2058500" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1951646">Blossomlove</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-10">02/10/24 17:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I actually like the bottles and the theme of making them different colors for each release. I mean, Tiziana uses the same bottle over and over, MFK, PDM, Kayali, Montale, Macera, Xerjoff-it's kind of what perfumers do.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2058500"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2058500#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2058197" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2058197" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="spectravondergeist"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1577352"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1577352.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="spectravondergeist" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/By-the-Fireplace-31623.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31623.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="By the Fireplace"title="By the Fireplace"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2058197ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2058197" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1577352">spectravondergeist</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-10">02/10/24 11:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm surprised at how much I like this as I usually don't enjoy grapefruit, pepper, or jasmine, and while this scent has all of those present, especially in the strong and astringent first spray that leaves me sneezing, they balance out into a sweet ambery, almost creamy dry down that is giving fruity pebbles, but I like it! There's a smokey fireplace scent in the background that I adore. (I'm a big By The Fireplace lover.) I understand how people get gingerbread Christmas vibes from this but it's a little too clean and elegant to give that vibe for me, as it's not exactly gourmand.<br />
<br />
I don't get the pine people are talking about, like in No2, which I also enjoy. People hate on this line because they're celeb frags and because No1 was so universally agreeable unlike the spicy unisex notes of 2 and 3. I think I do prefer this to both 2 and 1 but that is perhaps a recency bias as I've only had No3 for a day, but my preference is shocking to me given that on paper 1 and 2 are way more my style as I love sweet gourmandy scents, love piney scents, and hate citrus, jasmine, and pepper.  <br />
<br />
Considering making this my new signature. Something about it is addicting. I was disappointed it wouldn't be cherry when the red bottle with the cherry emoji was announced on Billie's instagram as I enjoy the current cherry trend, maybe cherry in the opening instead of grapefruit would've been nice. <br />
<br />
Horrible opening spray but turns into something beautiful. Isn't as strong or long-lasting as I'd like but not as bad as people make it out to be, and I'm someone who perhaps likes to smell a little too strongly</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2058197"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2058197#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2049671" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Tacky presentation.<br />
Similar to many other juices.<br />
Overexhausted theme. Nah...<br />
It's a pass.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2049671"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2049671#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2049648" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1919883">perfumejunkie90s</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-28">01/28/24 19:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Whats happening I'm confused why are people acting weird and immature over a perfume bottle? I find it quite beautiful and innovative, people who are talking so much about it must be 10 or something...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2045183"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2045183#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2033377" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1368533">ArtByLeia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-17">01/17/24 02:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Kind of a bummer that they just keep reusing this bottle design instead of, like, designing new ones? Especially considering how different they all smell from one another</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2033377"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2033377#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2029140" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2029140" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GiveYouOneGuess"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1451047"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1451047.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="GiveYouOneGuess" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2029140ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2029140" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1451047">GiveYouOneGuess</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-12">01/12/24 15:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Billie: Whats the most popular perfume of recent times?<br />
Perfumer: Baccarat Rouge 540<br />
Billie: Yep copy that!<br />
<br />
You really tried hard Billie! Really hard!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2029140"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2029140#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2021704" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2021704" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sleepystars"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1802045"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1802045.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sleepystars" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Thank-U-Next-2-0-68367.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68367.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Thank U Next 2.0"title="Thank U Next 2.0"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2021704ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2021704" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1802045">sleepystars</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-05">01/05/24 16:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>okay wow. i wasn't expecting to like this. i do not have the full size, but i purchased a 3ml sample from a small business on tiktok shop. i am a lover of eilish 1. i love sweet, spicy, and vanilla fragrances. recently i've been finding myself branching out and being more adventurous with scents. more woody, or fresh, or fruity florals rather than dessert fragrances. i came into this not expecting much because i wasn't sure if i would like the notes, but i surprisingly really do. i sprayed it on a piece of paper and liked it so i sprayed it on my wrist and my hoodie. it's only been 20 minutes but the opening grapefruit note is still there. i notice that a lot in this fragrance. the grapefruit adds a slight sweetness to the fresh, spicy, woody vibe. it smells piney and a little masculine but still unisex. i'm gonna keep using this sample and might end up buying a full size because i really do enjoy this fragrance. edit: i just ordered the 3.4oz on the ulta app and i'm very excited to have it in my collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2021704"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2021704#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2017956" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2017956" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="krr81"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1319373"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="krr81" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giardini-Di-Toscana/Bianco-Latte-64757.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64757.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bianco Latte"title="Bianco Latte"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2017956ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2017956" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1319373">krr81</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-02">01/02/24 11:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I went back and forth on blind buying this from Ulta while I had a coupon and points, but then I found a decant so I decided to sample it first. I am so glad I did because to me this is identical to Sweet Ash from Snif, which I already own. Honestly, pretty spot-on identical. If you already own Sweet Ash, you do not need this. If you wish you could have Eilish 3 in a home fragrance, buy the Sweet Ash candle (which I love, smells just like the EDP). If you wish Eilish 3 came in a smaller size, get the Sweet Ash travel size. Smells identical on my skin, same strength, projection, etc. <br />
<br />
FWIW, Sweet Ash (and Eilish 3) is NOT a dupe for BR 540, but it definitely has that DNA. I watched and read a ton of reviews before almost blind buying Eilish 3, and I'm honestly pretty surprised that no one has made the Sweet Ash comparison (though I saw a lot of BR 540 comparisons), though I don't think that particular Snif fragrance is super popular/viral right now, which could explain it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2017956"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2017956#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2016083" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2016083" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="windchime_00"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1538994"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1538994.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="windchime_00" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/English-Pear-Freesia-10314.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10314.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="English Pear & Freesia"title="English Pear & Freesia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2016083ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2016083" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1538994">windchime_00</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-31">12/31/23 07:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The first sniff I was unhappy because it wasn't what I was expecting based on the picture and description and yet it does fit *smoking* pine wood more than the needles. The grapefruit tastes like it has been sweetened and is more prominent in the first few minutes, and the pepper is there, yet feels well blended. It actually is quite lovely and not like other spicy fruity scents I have, but do I want to smell like this? No, not even as a person who loves pine scents.<br />
<br />
I want my HOME to smell like this! I hope Billie Eilish releases reed diffusers for all three, as I worry about safety of candles.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2016083"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2016083#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2011786" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2011786" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="20Diamonds"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1335595"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="20Diamonds" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zara/Love-Explosion-Special-Edition-90025.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90025.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Love Explosion Special Edition"title="Love Explosion Special Edition"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2011786ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2011786" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1335595">20Diamonds</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-27">12/27/23 01:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Finally got my hands on Billie 3. I adored the first one because of its vanilla uniqueness. Didn't get the urge to try #2 but never say never. <br />
<br />
#3 smells like Zara's Red Temptation Winter edition. I wish it has the longevity of RTW because it is nice. I wore it as my Christmas day scent and received compliments. Unfortunately the scent didn't linger past a few hours nor did it stay on my clothes a day later like Zara's RTW. I love the bottle and will keep but because of the longevity and price point I'll stick with RTW.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2011786"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2011786#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2002138" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I get headaches from lots of perfumes but not from this one</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2002138"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2002138#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2001554" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I am no connoisseur of fragrance but I absolutely adore this. I wish it wasn't a limited edition.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="2001554"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=2001554#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1996677" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1996677" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="perfumequeen234668"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1331360"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="perfumequeen234668" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1996677ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1996677" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1331360">perfumequeen234668</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-09">12/09/23 05:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have No2 and would like this one anyone  wanna swap? Message me!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="1996677"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=1996677#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1995541" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1995541" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ArlissLux"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1233841"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1233841.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ArlissLux" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sorce/Snow-Moon-Magic-95264.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95264.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Snow Moon Magic"title="Snow Moon Magic"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1995541ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1995541" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1233841">ArlissLux</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-07">12/07/23 20:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>two words: cash grab.<br />
<br />
eilish 3 had soooo much potential.<br />
this may sound odd but to me, it smells like delicious juicy fruit and big red gum mixed together.<br />
it's cozy, warm, and perfect for winter.<br />
sad thing is, it's watered-down and there's NO POWER.<br />
i believe billie said this was her last "eilish" perfume (limited edition). i could tell this was half as$'ed .<br />
<br />
i'll give it time to aerate but will probably end up selling.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="1995541"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=1995541#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1994711" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1994711" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ashely"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1186205"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ashely" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Monde-Gourmand/Chai-Epice-72662.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72662.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chai pic"title="Chai pic"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1994711ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1994711" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1186205">ashely</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-06">12/06/23 23:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This reminds me of a lighter version of Polo Red Extreme</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="1994711"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=1994711#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1994312" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1994312" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Samsfavescents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1917512"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1917512.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Samsfavescents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/Devotion-84951.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84951.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Devotion"title="Devotion"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1994312ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1994312" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1917512">Samsfavescents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-06">12/06/23 14:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Eilish no 3 smells very holiday-esque, and woodsy, and I much prefer it to Eilish no.2. Still quite unisex, with the pink peppercorn opening, for middle notes, and a creamy amber finish. Unfortunately, this scent has no lasting power and is gone too soon even from clothes. A bit of a letdown compared to the performance of the other Eilish fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="1994312"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=1994312#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1990745" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1990745" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Des96"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1905361"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1905361.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Des96" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70052.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eilish"title="Eilish"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1990745ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1990745" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1905361">Des96</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-02">12/02/23 13:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Soas a normal perfume consumer I actually love this, I just wish it lasted. If I had to describe it I would say its like walking into a really nice Christmas store, they have real trees and dried pink grapefruit garland, spicy pinecones and sweet candles line the back wall. It seems to stay a little bit longer after it has sat around awhile after getting it but still hard to smell on myself after 3-4 hrs, though other people seem to be able to? Ive never smelled anything like it. The BR540 comparison still doesnt seem fair to me because this has more grapefruit and fir, I get how people could see a likeness though. Im personally burnt out of BR but still love this one but because of the reviews here Id say if you hate BR its safe to stay away from this if you like it then you may enjoy this. It just doesnt last, sad because everyone says it smells really great at work. I wish it was permanent in her collection. <br />
<br />
Update: 6/27/24<br />
I just reached for this again to test out the longevity. I am happy to report it does seem to stick around longer now! I wore it to bed and smelled it for a few hours, its still not a strong performer but I could still smell it faintly on my sweater the next morning so much better than before! Still really like this and want another bottle even though this seems like a super controversial fragrance. Either a love or hate it seems!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="1990745"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=1990745#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1989250" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1989250" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Deliza1997"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1874663"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1874663.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Deliza1997" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42260.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Side Effect"title="Side Effect"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1989250ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1989250" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1874663">Deliza1997</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-30">11/30/23 15:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just wanted to come clean about my negative review on this fragrance as some may think I am just hateful towards this particular fragrance or brand. I am rating this perfume mostly based on its price and performance and it's geneneric cologne scent adds to its negative rating. I know there are many great smelling colognes but most of them are really inexpensive. It doesnt smell bad at all and can be passed as a good cologne or body mist  as it is very weak. If they want to release something similar to a generic cologne or mist they should price it like that.80 dollars (90$ to 100$ for early delivery) for this isnt justifiable as it doesnt perform. You can get Versace Eros, Prada Luna Rossa Carbon, Chanel Alure Homme Sport, Dolce Gabbana The One, The Only One  at the same price or 10$-20$ less, these  are far superior fragrances in quality and performance. I have no gain from dissing a perfume, I am not an influencer. I shared my opinion so that people can make better purchasing decision according to their taste and priority.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="1989250"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=1989250#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1988270" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1988270" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LLdeduction"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1710182"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1710182.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LLdeduction" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/XJ-1861-Naxos-30529.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30529.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="XJ 1861 Naxos"title="XJ 1861 Naxos"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1988270ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1988270" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1710182">LLdeduction</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-29">11/29/23 11:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like the holidays in a non-gourmand way! Mostly revolves around the fir and musk, but has a subtle sweetness underneath. The grapefruit is also noticeable in the opening, but quickly dissipates.<br />
<br />
I do wish it was more potent though, it seems very very weak on skin and clothes which is a bummer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="1988270"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=1988270#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1985361" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1985361" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="wendygjw"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1504098"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1504098.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="wendygjw" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-Paradoxe-75668.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75668.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada Paradoxe"title="Prada Paradoxe"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1985361ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1985361" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1504098">wendygjw</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-25">11/25/23 20:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Eilish No. 3 opens to a really piney and spicy which really gives of holiday vibes. But this fragrance does not perform well in winter. Wore this out and it does not last at all and the sillage is quite poor too. Quite a disapointment given than I really enjoyed Eilish 1. For the people saying that it is like BR540, my take is that I can see the similarity but I would not immediately associate Eilish 3 with BR540. Eilish 3 is a lot and really a lot more pine-like compared to the ambery goodness of BR540.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="1985361"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=1985361#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1983770" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1983770" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Triskit.Biskit"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898050"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1898050.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Triskit.Biskit" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1983770ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1983770" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898050">Triskit.Biskit</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-23">11/23/23 19:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have been wearing this everyday since I got it. Initially I had thought it was a very odd fragrance and didnt know how I felt. It was/is very sweet at first and I thought it had smelt very feminine. After about a week of wear I really started to notice the other deep/woodsy/musky notes and it started to rub me as more unisex/masculine. On the plus side everyone I have worn this around says I smell amazing and is always asking what Im wearing. Overall I really wish this was not limited edition because it has grown on me and has become one of my favorites. Its still up in the air for me but out of the whole collection currently my rankings are <br />
1.) Eilish No. 2<br />
2.) Eilish No. 3 <br />
3.) Eilish</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="1983770"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=1983770#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1981450" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1981450" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Faedriel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1581363"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1581363.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Faedriel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70052.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eilish"title="Eilish"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1981450ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1981450" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1581363">Faedriel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-20">11/20/23 21:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is another go from Billie Eilish. I ordered this and my long overdue bottle of No2 at the same time. I really do love this fragrance I have been, weirdly, looking for something that smelled like woods and fir needle but was also creamy and sweet. Thisis that! When it settles completely it smells so different to the first spray I almost had to do a double take. It does get nice and warm and cozy on the musk and amber and its just delightful. Im not sure I would describe this as a winter or Christmas fragrance, though I get why its perceived that way, but I definitely think some opinions on it are being formed from what they wished it was - a lot of people saw a red bottle and assumed cherry and were really disappointed when it was (thank god) not Another hot take on a cherry frag.<br />
<br />
Its lovely its easy to wear I view it as a sort of powered down every day version of some of my stronger more unisex leaning scents.<br />
<br />
The power might be too far down though. (Would absolutely make a Chernobyl analogy here but well skip it). In terms of strength, the original was just right. Perfect. Lasts all day and smells nice on clothes. No 2 - shes the definition of a use sparingly kind of gal. One spray in any and every intended place, and even then Im here for the sillage, I cant really get my nose down into it.<br />
This one - sooo light. <br />
I thought I had messed up so I put more on kinda light. I do wish the strength was on par with No1. <br />
<br />
Longevity though - gotta be fair, it wore all throughout the day. Lightly, but it was there and I would catch whiffs of it on a consistent basis. Delightful whiffs. <br />
<br />
Now Im always going to like the original the best but I also dont think thats a measure of anything, honestly. These are all the same line and definitely feel like they were thought of by the same person but theyre completely different fragrances and I think each one of them is their own kind of stellar.<br />
I think we do a disservice to all of them by comparing them to one another.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="1981450"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=1981450#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1981427" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1981427" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="deelynn1275"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1857846"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="deelynn1275" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1981427ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1981427" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1857846">deelynn1275</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-20">11/20/23 20:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Now, I dont know a whole lot about fragrances and what notes I smell, so this wont be a very detailed review. But, as a person who usually likes sweet, feminine smells, this one really grew on me! I didnt love the way it smelled straight after a spray (it smelled pretty strong and like..a lot), but it smells sweet and classy on me after drying down and being on my skin for a while. I almost wanted to say I liked it as much as the first one, but I think I do still like the first one more. This one, though, is how I was hoping it would be: unisex, but leaning more feminine this time. I do like that this fragrance line has challenged me to try out smells I may not have been as open to before.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="1981427"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=1981427#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1980979" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1980979" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vicky456"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1387792"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1387792.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vicky456" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1980979ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1980979" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1387792">Vicky456</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-20">11/20/23 09:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>After having this for a little while now, the scent has changed a bit but not too much. It is still that pine-christmas tree like scent. STILL NO BACCARAT, im convinced anyone saying it smells anything similar to it is lying lmao. It is a holiday fragrance. Christmas in a bottle! <br />
It has gotten like a fruity gingerbread spice, instead of just gingerbread spice now. Has a nice fresh base, the spice is very light. In general it is a light fragrance &amp; doesnt last too long which sucks bc i will be going through this fast, bc of that. Definitely wish this was permanent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="87945"comment_id="1980979"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html?ccid=1980979#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1980252" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
